Class CmdCdService

Represents a service for managing command cooldowns.

Syntax
public class CmdCdService : ILateBlocker, INService

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

CmdCdService(Mewdeko)

Initializes a new instance of the CmdCdService class.

Declaration
public CmdCdService(Mewdeko bot)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Mewdeko bot

The instance of the Mewdeko bot.
Remarks

This constructor retrieves all guild configurations from the bot and initializes the CommandCooldowns property. The CommandCooldowns property is a concurrent dictionary where the key is the guild ID and the value is a set of CommandCooldown objects.

Properties

| Edit this page View Source

ActiveCooldowns

Tracks active cooldowns for commands being executed by users across different guilds.

Declaration
public ConcurrentDictionary<ulong, ConcurrentHashSet<ActiveCooldown>> ActiveCooldowns { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
ConcurrentDictionary<ulong, ConcurrentHashSet<ActiveCooldown>>
Remarks

This dictionary maps guild IDs to a set of ActiveCooldown objects, indicating commands that are currently under cooldown for users within each guild. It prevents users from spamming commands by enforcing cooldown periods after a command's execution.

| Edit this page View Source

CommandCooldowns

Manages the collection of command cooldown configurations across different guilds.

Declaration
public ConcurrentDictionary<ulong, ConcurrentHashSet<CommandCooldown>> CommandCooldowns { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
ConcurrentDictionary<ulong, ConcurrentHashSet<CommandCooldown>>
Remarks

This dictionary maps guild IDs to a set of CommandCooldown objects, representing the cooldown configurations for commands within each guild. It ensures that commands can have custom cooldown periods on a per-guild basis.

| Edit this page View Source

Priority

The priority order in which the early behavior should run, with lower numbers indicating higher priority.

Declaration
public int Priority { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
int

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

TryBlock(IGuild?, IUser, string)

Core method for checking and applying command cooldowns to prevent command execution if the command is currently on cooldown for the user.

Declaration
public Task<bool> TryBlock(IGuild? guild, IUser user, string commandName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild in which the command was issued, may be null for direct messages.
IUser user

The user who issued the command.
string commandName

The name of the command to check the cooldown for.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that resolves to true if the command is currently on cooldown for the user; otherwise, false.
Remarks

Checks if the specified command is on cooldown for the user in the given guild. If so, blocks the command execution. This method manages cooldown state and ensures that commands cannot be spammed by tracking active cooldowns.

| Edit this page View Source

TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient, ICommandContext, string, CommandInfo)

Attempts to block a command execution based on the command's cooldown status for a given user in the context of traditional command interactions.

Declaration
public Task<bool> TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient client, ICommandContext ctx, string moduleName, CommandInfo command)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client instance.
ICommandContext ctx

The command context which includes information about the user, guild, and channel.
string moduleName

The name of the module containing the command.
CommandInfo command

Information about the command being executed.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that resolves to true if the command execution should be blocked due to cooldown; otherwise, false.
Remarks

This method checks if there's an existing cooldown for the command being executed by the user in the specified guild. If the command is on cooldown, the execution is blocked. This check is specific to traditional text-based commands.

| Edit this page View Source

TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient, IInteractionContext, ICommandInfo)

Attempts to block a command execution based on the command's cooldown status for a given user in the context of interaction-based commands.

Declaration
public Task<bool> TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient client, IInteractionContext ctx, ICommandInfo command)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client instance.
IInteractionContext ctx

The interaction context which includes information about the user, guild, and channel.
ICommandInfo command

Information about the interaction command being executed.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that resolves to true if the command execution should be blocked due to cooldown; otherwise, false.
Remarks

This method performs a similar function to TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient, ICommandContext, string, CommandInfo) but is tailored for interactions such as slash commands. It checks if the interaction command is on cooldown for the user.
